userId.label: User ID
userId.note: The user's email address. The special value me can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

includeSpamTrash.label: Include SPAM/TRASH
includeSpamTrash.note: Include messages from SPAM and TRASH in the results.

labelIds.label: Label IDs
labelIds.note: Only return messages with labels that match all of the specified label IDs.

maxResults.label: Max results
maxResults.note: Maximum number of messages to return.

q.label: Q
q.note: Only return messages matching the specified query. Supports the same query format as the Gmail search box. For example, "from:someuser@example.com rfc822msgid:<somemsgid@example.com> is:unread". Parameter cannot be used when accessing the api using the gmail.metadata scope.

fields.label: Fields
fields.note: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.
